summary: REQ-34 is not satisfied as written because the diff shows changes beyond inserting the specified micro-authority block in LandingPage.tsx, including modifications to additional files and additional landing page behavior/content changes not requested.

missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates 3 modified files, not just LandingPage.tsx.

hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-34 explicitly constrains scope to modifying only `frontend/src/components/asistenku/LandingPage.tsx`.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional landing page changes beyond inserting the new micro-authority block (e.g., adding/altering sections like 'Bagaimana Kami Mendampingi', changing hero layout/copy, and changing pricing accordion behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to change existing landing page copy/sections/behavior except inserting the new micro-authority block; diff metadata describes broader edits.
